h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - The Second Sister
content: Before you decide to give chase, let the little pig go and instead be sure to inspect the arena where you fought.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Village_of_Lanxi_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Village of Lanxi Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - The Second Sister'.
The content is as follows:
Before you decide to give chase, let the little pig go and instead be sure to inspect the arena where you fought.
